title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in the Czech Republic 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP per capita in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 30.
Overall GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, of value 30070.3 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, of value 5784.1 was reported at Year 1995
